AI
Cyclops
Entities
EquipmentSlots
ExosuitModuleEvent
Fires

Handles all of the Fires in the game. Currently, the only known Fire spawning is in SubFire.CreateFire(SubFire.RoomFire). The fires in the Aurora come loaded with the map and do not grow in size. If we want to create a Fire spawning mechanic outside of Cyclops fires, it should be added to Create(CyclopsFireData). Fire dousing goes by Id and does not need to be modified
